com.redhat.rhn.frontend.taglibs.list

Class SelectableColumnTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • TagSupport
      • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.taglibs.list.SelectableColumnTag

  • public class SelectableColumnTag
extends TagSupport
    Implements a simple selected checkbox like those used with RhnSets
